divs: Sighting DetailsI decided to go outside to investigate the orbs in my front yard to see if they were still there from yesterday. I was curious if they were affected by the cold and snow. They seemed not to be and looked to be playing in it. I then went to my back yard and notice a small blueish craft hovering inches above the snow. So I took a picture of it. I didn't notice that it was accompanied by others until I looked at it on my computer. I am starting to see a lot of them and I can't figure out why, I mean what iis the significance of this area? Well anyway I thought I'd better report it. Looked out my back window minutes later and didn't see it anymore.
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There was one other sighting in Kansas City on or around February 13th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Blue domed craft hovered inches above dog tracks
